biotools.summary: TSSFinder (ab initio prediction of the core promoter in eukaryotes) is a fast and accurate ab initio prediction of the core promoter in eukaryotic genomes. TSSFinder is a new software for TSS prediction that is faster and with higher accuracy than previously published applications.

bioschemas.name: TSSFinder
